column4: I'm having trouble with Pidgin. I won't be doing anything with it, and it randomly freezes. When I type it freezes, it just keeps freezing. How do I fix this?
using desktop effects (compiz?) try disabling it
yeah its on, but I need it on in order for docky to work. It just started doing this a few days ago.
this will remove your current configuration settings and you will have to reconfigure again: rm -fr .purple    ... perhaps something is wrong in there
